title: Bajaj Housing Finance launches Sambhav Home Loans for first-time home buyers
description: Borrowers will have attractive interest rates with affordable EMIs and the option to choose a repayment tenor of up to 20 years. With this, Bajaj Housing Finance will offer a full suit of offerings in the housing finance sector covering all customer categories.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
